sourcesContent:
import { connectSearchBox } from 'react-instantsearch-dom'; const SearchBox = ({ currentRefinement, isSearchStalled, refine }) => (
refine(event.currentTarget.value)} className="w-full py-4 px-8 rounded-lg text-lg border-2 border-purplePrimary border-opacity-50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-600 focus:border-transparent" placeholder="Search for Jobs" />
{isSearchStalled ? '' : ''}
); const Search = connectSearchBox(SearchBox); export default Search;
